conf.spark.synapse.library.python.env:
name: glow
channels:
  - bioconda
  - conda-forge
dependencies:
  - python=3.8.10
  - bedtools
  - click=7.1.1 # Docs notebook source generation
  - jinja2=2.11.3
  - jupyterlab
  - nomkl # Skip MKL for local development
  - nptyping=1.3.0
  - numpy=1.20.1
  - opt_einsum>=3.2.0
  - pandas=1.2.4
  - pip=21.0.1
  - pyarrow=4.0.0
  - pytest
  - pyyaml
  - scipy=1.6.2
  - scikit-learn=0.24.1
  - sphinx
  - sphinx_rtd_theme
  - statsmodels=0.12.2
  - typeguard=2.9.1
  - yapf=0.30.0
  - pip:
    - pyspark==3.2.1
    - databricks-cli==0.16.4 # Docs notebook source generation
    - setuptools==52.0.0 # Python packaging
    - twine==2.0.0 # Pypi publishing
    - sphinx-autobuild
    - Sphinx-Substitution-Extensions # Substitutions in code blocks
    - sphinx-tabs # Code tabs (Python/Scala)
    - sybil==3.0.0 # Automatic doctest
    - glow.py==1.2.1
conf.spark.synapse.library.python.env.name: environment.yml
